vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐκλεκτ-ός, ή, όν,
picked out, select, [Refs 6th c.BC+]; ἐ. δικασταί,=Latin iudices selecti, [Refs 2nd c.AD+] adverb -τῶς interpolated in Suid. see at {ἐπίλεκτος}.
__2 choice, pure, σμύρνη [LXX+3rd c.BC+]; ἐκλεκτόν,= corn, [LXX+2nd c.AD+]
__II chosen of God, elect, [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
elect, chosen, the Chosen One
chosen out, selected;, in NT chosen as a recipient of special privilege, elect, Col. 3:12; specially beloved, Lk. 23:35; possessed of prime excellence, exalted, 1Tim. 5:21; choice, precious, 1Pet. 2:4, 6
vocabInfos._es_Definition: escogido, elegido, seleccionado ; quizá excelente, selecto (1PE.2:6)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 被選上的
2) 被揀選的
2a) 天使 (提前 5:21)
2b) 彌賽亞 (路 23:35; 約 1:34)
3) 優秀的, 上好的
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 被选上的
2) 被拣选的
2a) 天使(提前5:21)
2b) 弥赛亚(路23:35; 约1:34)
3 ) 优秀的, 上好的
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: được chọn; được lựa chọn. Xem G1586
